values.qualification.title: Qualification
values.qualification.desc: Quality is the life of the brand and the life of the enterprise. Products with vitality is worth inheriting and is the driving force of our efforts.
values.creativity.title: Creativity
values.creativity.desc: Creativity comes from our love of life, which we extend to every aspect of product design.
values.responsibility.title: Responsibility
values.responsibility.desc: Responsibility is commitment. We always regard our customers affairs as our own responsibility to abide.
values.variety.title: Variety
values.variety.desc: Diversity of products gives customers a variety of choices, and also gives us more opportunities to enter more areas.
values.flexibility.title: Flexibility
values.flexibility.desc: Flexibility is reflected in all stages of cooperation: from product design, tooling, Sampling, packaging to shipping. we provide full support to customers
values.audit.title: Audit
values.audit.desc: Whether it's ordinary quality management factory audit, or social responsibility audit; or large retail stores' direct factory audit, or third-party audit. We can fulfill all kinds of customer's factory audit's requirements.
values.oem.title: OEM
values.oem.desc: We have more than 30 years experiences in OEM & ODM cooperation with worldwide customers. We have been working with more than 100 brand customers so far. More and more customers are joining us!
values.environment.title: Environment
values.environment.desc: Environmental protection is not a slogan anymore, but a top priority related to human beings. By developing silicone products to reduce the usage of disposable items can protect our earth.

about.manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Capability
about.manufacturing.desc: Compression, injection lines, CNC, printing, mixing, packing lines.
about.certification.title: Honors & Certifications
about.certification.desc: Dongguan Fans Silicone Technology Co., Ltd. was certified as a "High-tech Enterprise" from 2023 to 2026. In 2017, we were awarded the plaque for "Guangdong Engineering Technology Research Center for Daily High-temperature Resistant Silicone Rubber Products". In 2020, we received the Alibaba "Gold Medal Product Enterprise" certification. In 2022, we were recognized by the Dongguan Bureau of Industry and Information Technology as a "Specialized, Refined, Differential, and Innovative" (SRDI) enterprise. Adhering to the corporate spirit of "Enhancing quality to promote growth, expanding markets with reputation," we actively explore domestic and international markets, providing high-quality products and services to renowned brands worldwide. All our tests comply with various international standards, reflecting our excellent product quality. Over the years, Dongguan Fans Silicone Technology Co., Ltd. has strictly controlled every aspect from R&D, raw materials, and craftsmanship to processes and inspections. It is through these diligent efforts that we have become a leader in the silicone industry.
